name: 30% ruling - young professional with master's
description: Professional under 30 with master's degree at reduced threshold €40,000

sources.description: Young professional (<30) with master's degree qualifies with lower threshold
sources.notes: Taxable: €28,000 (70%), Tax: €10,351.60, General credit: €3,151, Labour credit: €5,441, Net ≈ €33,250
